items.sentence: Have some respect for other people\'s opinions.
Tom was worried that he might lose his license.
Tom worked very hard and earned a lot of money.
When did you find out that Tom couldn\'t drive?
When do you think you\'re going to Boston next?
I wish that I didn\'t have to go to work today.
My father didn\'t allow me to study in the USA.
Mary is starting to look a lot like her mother.
I go to the movies three or four times a month.
Tom realized that Mary wasn\'t happy in Boston.
